title: Why can’t The Voice (US) produce any superstars like American Idol does? - Quora

response.answer_text: Because they don't really allow the public to pick the winner & who stays or goes. They make you think you do though. Also the winner etc isnt always signed to the best label and the powers dont promote them well. They also don't get to pick their songs every week so we dont get total idea of artist wanna be etc. There is so many reasons why but this is just some.
